name: double denim smock
description:
you'll never leave the house without it

one of a kind, deconstructed, button-down smock

wear it over things, wear it under things, belt it, button it, leave it 
open!

and the pockets hold everything you need

longer in front, shorter in the back

classic dark cotton denim with double ghost pockets

sizing:

(smocks can fit many sizes. see measurements below and sizing diagram on our info page)

length in front: 42"

length in back: 34"

width: 27"

model is a size 6, and 5'11" tall

name: pick-a-pocket tee / evergreen
description:
our new light-as-air tee is all you'll want to put on

70% modal, 30% wool, this unique blend is as soft as feathers

in a deep forest green

and, best of all, this shirt lets you customize it!

select a patch pocket of your choosing from our curated batch of vintage pockets

no two shirts will be the same

raglan sleeves

also available without pocket

one size - fits most

measures: 
21" long in front 
26" long in back

name: pick-a-pocket tee / white
description:
our new light-as-air tee is all you'll want to put on

70% modal, 30% wool, this unique blend is as soft as feathers


and, better yet, this shirt lets you customize it!

select a patch pocket of your choosing from our curated batch of vintage pockets

no two shirts will be the same

raglan sleeves

measures:
21" long in front
26" long in back

name: pick-a-pocket tee / indigo
description:
our new light-as-air tee is all you'll want to put on

70% modal, 30% wool, this unique blend is as soft as feathers

indigo dyed the perfect deep blue


and, better yet, this shirt lets you customize it!

select a patch pocket of your choosing from our curated batch of vintage pockets

no two shirts will be the same

raglan sleeves

also available without pocket

one size - fits most

measures:
21" long in front
26" long in back

*naturally dyed items range in color and finish. slight variations and spotting are normal and are what make them special!

name: field dress / greyscale
description:
turn heads in your favorite new dress

super comfortable and easy to wear

designed for versatility, so you can wear it any way you like it

neckline cutout detail and side pockets polish it off

made to be worn loosely  (we like if off one shoulder!)

100% organic cotton sueded muslin -- a perfect year-round fabric

layer over tights in winter, and on its own for summer

dyed a perfect silver shade using a rust/tea natural dye

grey and white patch pocket

exclusive batch, so snatch them up

one size fits most

measures:
42" long
20" wide at waist (side to side)
8" long sleeves

name: field dress / light denim
description:
turn heads in your favorite new dress

super comfortable and easy to wear

designed for versatility, so you can wear it any way you like it

neckline cutout detail and side pockets polish it off

made to be worn loosely  (we like if off one shoulder!)

layer over tights in winter, and on its own for summer

a gorgeous woven fabric (45% organic cotton / 55% hemp) in a classic denim shade

limited run

one size fits most

measures:
42" long
20" wide at waist (side to side)
8" long sleeves

description:
turn heads in your favorite new dress

super comfortable and easy to wear

neckline cutout detail and side pockets polish it off

measures:

20" wide at waist (side to side)
8" long sleeves

name: origami pants / grey duck
description:
meet the new origami pants

with a few new tweaks, these pants have become our absolute favorite things

we made them slightly longer for the winter, hitting at the perfect boot height.

they're elegant enough for work or events, comfortable enough for everyday!

a versatile light grey cotton duck (55% recycled hemp, 45% organic cotton), with teeny tiny hints of color throughout weave

an ideal weight for chilly days (also perfect for layering over long underwear!)

one size fits most, wrap style pants

with adjustable tie closure

fold over waist line and patch pocket 

gathered ankle detail

limited edition so snatch them while they're here!

warning: you may never want to wear other pants again.

measures:
43" long
25" wide when fully open

name: origami pants / black twill
description:
meet the new origami pants

with a few new tweaks, these pants have become our absolute favorite things

we made them slightly longer for the winter, hitting at the perfect boot height.

they're elegant enough for work or events, comfortable enough for everyday!

a gorgeous and durable black twill 
(45% hemp, 45% organic cotton, 10% wool) 

an ideal weight for chilly days (also perfect for layering over long underwear!)

one size fits most, wrap style pants with adjustable tie closure

fold over waist line and patch pocket are lined in a light grey cotton

gathered ankle detail

limited edition so snatch them while they're here!

warning: you may never want to wear other pants again.

**These pants sold out quickly!  A new batch is in production and are currently available for PRE-ORDER. They will ship in 2-4 weeks. (Worth the wait, we promise!)


measures:
43" long
25" wide when fully open

name: origami pants / striped
description:
warning: you may never want to wear other pants again.

one size fits all

wrap style pants

with adjustable tie closure

and fold over waist line

patch pocket on front

gathered ankle detail

tan hand painted pin stripes on organic cotton twill

measures 36” long

24" wide when fully open

limited edition so snatch them while they're here!

*hand painted items range in color and finish.  slight variations are normal and are what make them special!

name: bralette / black
description:
the new STATE bralette is made to be as comfortable as possible

made from organic cotton (95% OC, 5% spandex) 

lined cups for extra coverage

pico elastic gives it a girly and vintage feel

adjustable straps

ideal for A to small C cups

available in XS, S, M

name: bralette + undies set / black
description:
matching spinster undies + bralette

95% organic cotton, 5% spandex

available in any mix of size ranges

don't see your desired combination below, send us a message!

name: spinster undies / black
description:
classic undies, the perfect blend of practical and flirty

the low-rise, full bum fit makes them the most comfortable underwear you own

made from a 95% organic cotton, 5% spandex blend

pico elastic trim gives them a girly and vintage vibe

available in XS, S, M, L

name: pollock britches
description:
hello, new favorite thing!

introducing new styles of our classic britches

paint splattered with black and grey ink

limited edition, no two pairs the same 

on soft organic cotton - handmade in the USA

flattering high waisted design

perfect for lounging or under a sheer skirt

made in limited edition runs

*naturally dyed items range in color and finish. slight variations are normal and are what make them special!

name: bleached leather card holder
description:
slip it in your pocket, throw it in your bag

anywhere you put it, this little guy will keep you stylish AND organized

made from painterly bleached brown leather

machine stitched

holds many cards

measures 3" x 4"

name: the schlepper
description:
laundry day, epic picnics, odd deliveries --you name it, we're schlepping it!

by popular demand, we bring you this gigantic bag

we don't know about you, but here at STATE we're always carrying too much!

and city life - sans car - means you're schlepping it on your shoulders

this is hard enough!  let's at least do it in style!

made from a 16oz organic hemp canvas

gusseted bottom for holding nearly everything

webbed hemp straps with vintage red and white trim detail overlay

huge pocket on one side with leather STATE tag

machine washable

made to order, please allow 2 week to ship

measures:

40" wide,  30" tall

straps  25" long

name: bleached leather suspenders
description:
practical meets sartorial

painterly bleached leather

cross-back suspenders

adjustable

will work with high-waisted garments as well as low-rise

made to order: please allow 1-2 weeks

46" fully extended from clasp to clasp

1" wide

name: fawn slouch hat
description:
a hat that's slouchy in all the right ways

made from 100% New York alpaca fiber

grown, shorn, spun, woven, designed, and made in the US

a warm fawn color - straight from the alpaca!

the perfect fall/winter accessory for all genders and ages!

measures roughly 11" long and 22" around the head

leather STATE garment tag

limited edition

name: indigo alpaca head tie
description:
made from 100% New York alpaca fiber

grown, shorn, spun, woven, designed, and made in the US

a soft and cozy knit that hugs your head

available dyed with organic indigo for the richest, deepest blue

or in a beautiful natural tan

the perfect fall/winter hair accent

measures roughly 37" long and 6" at widest point

limited edition

*naturally dyed items range in color and finish.  slight variations are normal and are what make them special!

name: slouch hat
description:

name: $50 gift card
description:
Looking for the perfect gift and can’t make up your mind?

 

Introducing, the STATE gift card!

 

Perfect for your stylish friend, wife, mom, daughter, neighbor, boss, etc!

 

In 3 varying amounts (50, 100, 200) there’s something for everyone.

 

The gift card comes stamped on a STATE hang tag and is packaged in a sweet stitched canvas envelope with red thread.

 

After purchase, fill out this form to give us the details of your gift.

 

We’re happy to mail it to you to give in person, or to ship it directly to the recipient!
